text: Ðis sind ða landgemæra ðara twegra hida ðe hyrað to Osanlea.
East on ða lanan, and ðonne andlang slades on ðone blacan pyt.
Of ðane pytte on ðone lampyt.
Of ðan pytte ut on byrcan slæd.
Of byrcan slade on ða ealdan dic.
Of ðære ealdan dic on henna riðe.
Of henna riðe up andlang slædes to ipan lea.
Of ipan lea on bromhæg andlang weges on ða lanan, and ðara twegra hyda wuda innan gemænnesse.
